SpriteCharacterControllerExt
MonoBehaviour
[AddComponentMenu("Directional Sprites - Sprite Character Controller")]
public sealed
SpriteCharacterControllerExt

A more complex version of the SpriteMovementController which adds running and pushing animations as well as the ability to actually move around.

Example

Character Controller

OnValidate
private void OnValidate()

[Editor-Only] Sets the character's starting sprite in Edit Mode so you can see it while working in the scene.

Called by the Unity Editor in Edit Mode whenever an instance of this script is loaded or a value is changed in the Inspector.
